alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 03 at 8:06PM CDT until further notice by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Heavy rain and storms on Tuesday are expected to result in water rises along the Black Warrior River. A flood warning is now in effect for the Black Warrior River. Another statement will be issued by Monday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. At 94.0 feet, Some secondary roads in the area begin to flood. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 84.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday morning and continue rising to a crest of 91.2 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
